words.source: H5221 wayyiqtol 3mp Hophal of נָכָה 'to strike'; KJV 'were beaten', ESV 'were beaten', NASB 'were beaten'
H7860 n.mp constr. of שֹׁטֵר 'officer, foreman'; KJV 'officers of', ESV 'foremen of', NASB 'foremen of'
H1121 n.mp constr. of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'children of', ESV 'people of', NASB 'sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H834 rel. pron. 'who, which, that'; KJV 'which', ESV 'whom', NASB 'whom'
H7760 Qal perf. 3cp of שׂוּם 'to set, place, appoint'; KJV 'had set', ESV 'had set', NASB 'had set'
H5921 prep. + 3mp suff. עַל 'upon, over'; KJV 'over them', ESV 'over them', NASB 'over them'
H5065 Qal ptc. mp constr. of נָגַשׂ 'to press, drive'; KJV 'taskmasters', ESV 'taskmasters', NASB 'taskmasters'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H4069 interrog. adv. 'why?'; KJV 'wherefore', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H3808 neg. particle; all trans. agree
H3615 Piel perf. 2mp of כָּלָה 'to complete, finish'; KJV 'fulfilled', ESV 'completed', NASB 'completed'
H2706 n.ms + 2mp suff. of חֹק 'statute, allotment, quota'; KJV 'your task', ESV 'your required quantity', NASB 'your required amount'
H3835 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of לָבַן 'to make bricks'; KJV 'in making brick', ESV 'of bricks', NASB 'of making bricks'
H8543 prep. k- + adv. תְּמוֹל 'yesterday'; KJV 'heretofore', ESV 'as in the past', NASB 'previously'
H8032 adv. שִׁלְשׁוֹם 'day before yesterday'; idiom with תְּמוֹל = 'formerly, in the past'
H1571 adv. גַּם 'also, both'; KJV 'both', ESV 'both', NASB 'both'
H8543 adv. תְּמוֹל 'yesterday'; KJV 'yesterday', ESV 'yesterday', NASB 'yesterday'
H1571 adv. גַּם 'also'; KJV 'and', ESV 'and', NASB 'and'
H3117 def. art. + n.ms יוֹם 'day'; with article = 'today'; KJV 'to day', ESV 'today', NASB 'today'
